text:
Not sure if it’s possible but if it’s not I know people would love it if we could bundle themes and modules together.

There are situations where a lot of a theme is really the modules within it.
(new to marketplace)
right but I thought you couldn’t include custom modules in market templates
I’m just joking, you’re right that would be a great thing to have.

Um is this correct for the new DM 2 and marketplace? We've been rebuilding all of our themes to use mainly "custom modules" so that we could build in the functionality to allow easier editing. If not, then we are going to have to start all over again. cc: <@U22PWJ41G> <@U22PNRAJD>
I’m not 100% sure myself I think I had heard it from someone on the slack
<@U7SL518D6> many moons ago we didn’t allow Custom Modules to be used in templates in the Marketplace. However, as of ~Sept. 17, 2016 we enabled the ability to do so.
sorry for the scare everyone I had clearly way out-dated information

Shawn if it was the tile that was green with the silhouette of a guy, I’m pretty sure it’s HubSpot.  The domain or something like that was registered to you.  We looked it up when it popped up.  I thought you might be testing if a providers module would submit correctly.
